moves.name: Avatar State
moves.description: Aang enters the Avatar State, becoming extremely powerful

moves.name: Tornado Whirl
moves.description: Aang spins a dazzling whirlwind at his opponent

moves.name: Dolphin Spray
moves.description: Aang showers his opponent with a strong burst of water

characters.name: Joo Dee
characters.description: pawn of the Earth Kingdom, one of many Joo Dees, kinda creepy tbh

moves.name: Creepy Twin
moves.description: Joo Dee clones herself and confuses her opponent

moves.name: Dirt Sandwich
moves.description: Joo Dee raises the earth on either side of her enemy and squishes them between two large slabs of dirt

moves.name: Trapped Tears
moves.description: Joo Dee launches a mix of her tears and packed dirt at her opponent like dodgeballs

moves.name: Cage
moves.description: Joo Dee traps her opponent in an earthen cage

new moves.name: Cage
new moves.description: Aang traps his opponent in an earthen cage
